${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${modID}:ShelteredPower.NAME: Sheltered
DESCRIPTIONS: This enemy is currently #ySheltered, providing #yGold per turn. Can give a maximum of #b100 #yGold.

${modID}:DependentPower.NAME: Dependent
DESCRIPTIONS: If this enemy loses ALL of its Block, it gets Stunned.

${modID}:CutTheFundingPower.NAME: Cut the Funding
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards with #yInvest cost less gold to play.

${modID}:OverflowingPocketsPower.NAME: Overflowing Pockets
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards with #yInvest more than this amount are played twice.

${modID}:PickPocketPower.NAME: Pickpocket
DESCRIPTIONS: When you deal unblocked damage, gain Gold.
